originalText.text: The gold standard in patient care.   Nursing staff is wonderful and caring - with a very low nurse to patient ratio.  The care team does everything they can to make your treatment as comfortable as possible, while using state of the art technology.  Facilities have been recently renovated, and are clean, bright and comfortable.  Highly recommend!
